## aads adgroups find

Find ad groups in a campaign with selector

```
aads adgroups find [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --all                    Fetch all pages
      --campaign-id int        Campaign ID
      --field string           Filter field
  -h, --help                   help for find
      --limit int              Max results (default 20)
      --offset int             Start offset
      --op string              Filter operator
      --selector-json string   Selector JSON
      --values string          Filter values (comma-separated)
```
